about.title: About Me
about.summary: I work as a Full Stack Developer at Meta, where I build dynamic user interfaces and efficient back-end services for a comprehensive system that manages hotel networks. I use React.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL to enhance system functionality and operational efficiency, collaborating closely with the team to understand business needs and deliver solutions that meet or exceed client expectations.
about.passion: I'm passionate about software development. I'm always eager to learn new things and improve my skills as a developer.

highlights: Development of scalable web applications and microservices for high-traffic platforms
Implementation of SSR and SSG with Next.js and Nuxt.js
Microservices development with Node.js, Express and Java Spring Boot
Database optimization with PostgreSQL, MongoDB and Redis
CI/CD pipeline configuration with GitHub Actions and Jenkins

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Each project showcases my skills and expertise.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce application built with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Features include product listing, shopping cart, and user authentication with payment integration.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A modern web application for managing tasks and projects. Built with React, Redux, and Node.js. Features include task creation, assignment, and real-time progress tracking.

projects.title: Weather Forecast API
projects.description: A Node.js application that provides real-time weather data and forecasts. Built with Express, TypeScript, and OpenWeatherMap API integration.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: A real-time chat application built with Socket.io, React, and Node.js. Features include message history, user authentication, and real-time notifications.
